ygData.subject: any human necromancers out there?
ygData.msgSnippet: Can anyone give some recommendations about  where to go on 10th lvl, as a human necro in qeynos? For the last 3 levels i ve been in west karana, and i m
ygData.messageBody:
Can anyone give some recommendations about where to go on 10th lvl, as a
human necro in qeynos?
For the last 3 levels i've been in west karana, and i'm looking for better
places to hunt, as the xp and the loot i get in karana
from the creatures i can handle there ( mostly giant spiders, giant
beetles,lions , the occasional grizzly ) , is quite bad.
From the times i've been to black burrow, it looks that place is just
impossible, because of all of the people that hang around there all of the
time, pulling train after train..
Is there any undead hunting site near qeynos, besides the ruins in the
hills? I realy want to put my ward-undead to use..

death to all,

Trenzorian/Tunare


If we aren't supposed to eat animals , why are they made of meat?
